WEEK_1: Understand the systematic design process
Apply the one task one function rule

Create abstractions that replace repetitive code
Use existing libraries or code to design new programs
WEEK_6: Interpret non code models of a program
Map non code models to program structure
Use non code models to guide program design

Explain rationale behind design decisions

WEEK_7: Validate software systems using black box testing
